mapper.sql: ID,NAME,ADDRESS, EXPECT_RENT, VR_PATH, THUMBNAIL_PATH, COMMUNITY_ID, FLOOR, ROOM, DECORATION_TYPE_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, HAVE_KITCKEN, HAVE_BALCONY, HOUSE_STATUS_ID, ENABLED
mapper.insert: insert into HOUSE (ID,NAME, ADDRESS, EXPECT_RENT, VR_PATH, THUMBNAIL_PATH, COMMUNITY_ID, FLOOR, ROOM, DECORATION_TYPE_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, HAVE_KITCKEN, HAVE_BALCONY, HOUSE_STATUS_ID, ENABLED) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectRent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{decorationTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{haveKitcken,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{haveBalcony,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{houseStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update HOUSE
ADDRESS = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECT_RENT = #{expectRent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VR_PATH = #{vrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THUMBNAIL_PATH = #{thumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ROOM = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DECORATION_TYPE_ID = #{decorationTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HAVE_KITCKEN = #{haveKitcken,jdbcType=TINYINT},
HAVE_BALCONY = #{haveBalcony,jdbcType=TINYINT},
HOUSE_STATUS_ID = #{houseStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update HOUSE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPECT_RENT = #{expectRent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VR_PATH = #{vrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THUMBNAIL_PATH = #{thumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ROOM = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DECORATION_TYPE_ID = #{decorationTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "HAVE_ KITCKEN" = #{haveKitcken,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HAVE_BALCONY = #{haveBalcony,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HOUSE_STATUS_ID = #{houseStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT HOUSE.ID, HOUSE.NAME, HOUSE.ADDRESS, HOUSE.EXPECT_RENT, HOUSE.VR_PATH, HOUSE.THUMBNAIL_PATH, COMMUNITY.ID, COMMUNITY.NAME, HOUSE.FLOOR, HOUSE.ROOM, DECORATION_TYPE.NAME, PROVINCE.provinceName, CITY.cityName, AREA.areaID, AREA.areaName, HOUSE.HAVE_KITCKEN, HOUSE.HAVE_BALCONY, HOUSE_STATUS.STATUS_NAME, HOUSE.ENABLED FROM HOUSE JOIN PROVINCE ON HOUSE.PROVINCE_ID = PROVINCE.provinceID JOIN CITY ON HOUSE.CITY_ID = CITY.cityID JOIN AREA ON HOUSE.AREA_ID = AREA.areaID JOIN COMMUNITY ON HOUSE.COMMUNITY_ID = COMMUNITY.ID JOIN DECORATION_TYPE ON HOUSE.DECORATION_TYPE_ID = DECORATION_TYPE.ID JOIN HOUSE_STATUS ON HOUSE.HOUSE_STATUS_ID = HOUSE_STATUS.ID WHERE COMMUNITY.NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
